question: When is the International Day for Victims of Enforced Disappearances observed?
explanation:
Every year 30th of August is observed by the United Nations as “International Day for Victims of Enforced Disappearances”.
On 21 December 2010, the United Nations adopted a resolution in this regard. Victims of enforced disappearance are those who are deprived of all their rights and liberties and are at the mercy of their captors.
